## Events.BlockChange class

Notifies listeners when some element of a block has changed (e.g. field values, comments, etc).

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class BlockChange extends BlockBase 
```
**Extends:** [BlockBase](./blockly.events.blockbase.md)

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(opt\_block, opt\_element, opt\_name, opt\_oldValue, opt\_newValue)](./blockly.events.blockchange._constructor_.md) |  | Constructs a new instance of the <code>BlockChange</code> class |

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [element?](./blockly.events.blockchange.element.md) |  | string | _(Optional)_ The element that changed; one of 'field', 'comment', 'collapsed', 'disabled', 'inline', or 'mutation' |
|  [name?](./blockly.events.blockchange.name.md) |  | string | _(Optional)_ The name of the field that changed, if this is a change to a field. |
|  [newValue](./blockly.events.blockchange.newvalue.md) |  | unknown | The new value of the element. |
|  [oldValue](./blockly.events.blockchange.oldvalue.md) |  | unknown | The original value of the element. |
|  [type](./blockly.events.blockchange.type.md) |  | EventType |  |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [isNull()](./blockly.events.blockchange.isnull.md) |  | Does this event record any change of state? |
|  [run(forward)](./blockly.events.blockchange.run.md) |  | Run a change event. |
|  [setDisabledReason(disabledReason)](./blockly.events.blockchange.setdisabledreason.md) |  | Set the language-neutral identifier for the reason why the block was or was not disabled. This is only valid for events where element is 'disabled'. Defaults to 'MANUALLY\_DISABLED'. |
|  [toJson()](./blockly.events.blockchange.tojson.md) |  | Encode the event as JSON. |
